options.content:
This dashboard features a Timeliness computation of data published at the following interfaces:
 - AUXIP.

Auxiliary data is divided into two categories:
 - Several per day (timeliness should be below 10 minutes);
 - One per day (timeliness should be below 30 minutes).

The list of products and their associated frequency :

| Timeliness                | Product Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|---------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Several per day (<10 min) | AUX_WND, AUX_PREORB, AUX_RESORB, AUX_POEORB, AUX_ECMWFD, AX___MF1_AX, AX___MFA_AX, AX___MA1_AX, AX___MF2_AX, AX___MA2_AX, SR___MDO_AX, SR_2_RMO_AX, SR_2_PMO_AX                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| One per day (<30 min)     | AUX_ICE, AUX_TRO, MPL_ORBPRE, MPL_ORBRES, MPL_TLEPRE, TLM__REQ_B, TLM__REQ_C, TLM__REQ_D, TLM__REQ_E, TLM__REQ_F, AUX_CAMSFO, AUX_UT1UTC, TLM__REQ_A, TLM__REQ_B, REP__CHF__, REP__FCHF__, MPL_ORBPRE, MPL_ORBRES, SR_2_PMPSAX, SR_2_POL_AX, SR_2_PGI_AX, SR_2_RGI_AX, SR_1_USO_AX, SR___MGNSAX, SL_2_SSTAAX, SL_2_DIMSAX, AX___FPO_AX, AX___FRO_AX, AUX_POEORB, AUX_GNSSRD, SR_2_PCPPAX, SR_2_PMPPAX, SR___MGNPAX, SR___POEPAX, SR_2_SIFNAX, SR_2_SIFSAX |

Timeliness is computed from metadata attached to each Auxiliary data (Publication Date - Origin Date).

Discrepancies are displayed through the following indicators:
 - Percent of data below timeliness threshold;
 - Average timeliness of data;
 - Time series of data displayed against the timeliness threshold;
 - Detailed list of data out of accepted range.

Information is available for each mission managed by OMCS.

Tips:
 - Annotations are available on time series;
 - Mission to consider can be selected in the upper bar.


The information displayed was originally taken from Product at AUXIP  

Time reference for this dashboard is : sensing_start_date

Important notice : Tables & timelines can only display up to 10 000 entries. Please make use of filters to narrow down the retrieved data and get a more realistic view.

panels.description: Timeliness for files published several times per day

targets.query: transfer_timeliness: [0 TO 600000000] AND service_type : AUXIP AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_type: ("AUX_WND" OR "AUX_PREORB" OR "AUX_RESORB" OR "AUX_POEORB" OR "AUX_ECMWFD" OR "AX___MF1_AX" OR "AX___MFA_AX" OR "AX___MA1_AX" OR "AX___MF2_AX" OR "AX___MA2_AX" OR "SR___MDO_AX" OR "SR_2_RMO_AX" OR "SR_2_PMO_AX") AND product_type: $product_type

service_type : AUXIP AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_type: ("AUX_WND" OR "AUX_PREORB" OR "AUX_RESORB" OR "AUX_POEORB" OR "AUX_ECMWFD" OR "AX___MF1_AX" OR "AX___MFA_AX" OR "AX___MA1_AX" OR "AX___MF2_AX" OR "AX___MA2_AX" OR "SR___MDO_AX" OR "SR_2_RMO_AX" OR "SR_2_PMO_AX") AND product_type: $product_type

panels.title: "Several per day" Timeliness (< 10 min)

targets.query: service_type : AUXIP AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_type: ("AUX_WND" OR "AUX_PREORB" OR "AUX_RESORB" OR "AUX_POEORB" OR "AUX_ECMWFD" OR "AX___MF1_AX" OR "AX___MFA_AX" OR "AX___MA1_AX" OR "AX___MF2_AX" OR "AX___MA2_AX" OR "SR___MDO_AX" OR "SR_2_RMO_AX" OR "SR_2_PMO_AX") AND product_type: ${product_type}

service_type : AUXIP AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_type: ("AUX_WND" OR "AUX_PREORB" OR "AUX_RESORB" OR "AUX_POEORB" OR "AUX_ECMWFD" OR "AX___MF1_AX" OR "AX___MFA_AX" OR "AX___MA1_AX" OR "AX___MF2_AX" OR "AX___MA2_AX" OR "SR___MDO_AX" OR "SR_2_RMO_AX" OR "SR_2_PMO_AX") AND product_type : ${product_type}

panels.description: Timeliness for files published once or less than once per day

targets.query: transfer_timeliness: [0 TO 1800000000] AND service_type : AUXIP AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_type : ("AUX_ICE" OR "AUX_TRO" OR "MPL_ORBPRE" OR "MPL_ORBRES" OR "MPL_TLEPRE" OR "TLM__REQ_B" OR "TLM__REQ_C" OR "TLM__REQ_D" OR "TLM__REQ_E" OR "TLM__REQ_F" OR "AUX_CAMSFO" OR "AUX_UT1UTC" OR "TLM__REQ_A" OR "TLM__REQ_B" OR "REP__CHF__" OR "REP__FCHF__" OR "MPL_ORBPRE" OR "MPL_ORBRES" OR "SR_2_PMPSAX" OR "SR_2_POL_AX" OR "SR_2_PGI_AX" OR "SR_2_RGI_AX" OR "SR_1_USO_AX" OR "SR___MGNSAX" OR "SL_2_SSTAAX" OR "SL_2_DIMSAX" OR "AX___FPO_AX" OR "AX___FRO_AX" OR "AUX_POEORB" OR "AUX_GNSSRD" OR "SR_2_PCPPAX" OR "SR_2_PMPPAX" OR "SR___MGNPAX" OR "SR___POEPAX" OR "SR_2_SIFNAX" OR "SR_2_SIFSAX") AND product_type: $product_type

service_type : AUXIP AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_type : ("AUX_ICE" OR "AUX_TRO" OR "MPL_ORBPRE" OR "MPL_ORBRES" OR "MPL_TLEPRE" OR "TLM__REQ_B" OR "TLM__REQ_C" OR "TLM__REQ_D" OR "TLM__REQ_E" OR "TLM__REQ_F" OR "AUX_CAMSFO" OR "AUX_UT1UTC" OR "TLM__REQ_A" OR "TLM__REQ_B" OR "REP__CHF__" OR "REP__FCHF__" OR "MPL_ORBPRE" OR "MPL_ORBRES" OR "SR_2_PMPSAX" OR "SR_2_POL_AX" OR "SR_2_PGI_AX" OR "SR_2_RGI_AX" OR "SR_1_USO_AX" OR "SR___MGNSAX" OR "SL_2_SSTAAX" OR "SL_2_DIMSAX" OR "AX___FPO_AX" OR "AX___FRO_AX" OR "AUX_POEORB" OR "AUX_GNSSRD" OR "SR_2_PCPPAX" OR "SR_2_PMPPAX" OR "SR___MGNPAX" OR "SR___POEPAX" OR "SR_2_SIFNAX" OR "SR_2_SIFSAX") AND product_type: $product_type

panels.title: "One per day" timeliness (< 30 min)

targets.query: service_type : AUXIP AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_type : ("AUX_ICE" OR "AUX_TRO" OR "MPL_ORBPRE" OR "MPL_ORBRES" OR "MPL_TLEPRE" OR "TLM__REQ_B" OR "TLM__REQ_C" OR "TLM__REQ_D" OR "TLM__REQ_E" OR "TLM__REQ_F" OR "AUX_CAMSFO" OR "AUX_UT1UTC" OR "TLM__REQ_A" OR "TLM__REQ_B" OR "REP__CHF__" OR "REP__FCHF__" OR "MPL_ORBPRE" OR "MPL_ORBRES" OR "SR_2_PMPSAX" OR "SR_2_POL_AX" OR "SR_2_PGI_AX" OR "SR_2_RGI_AX" OR "SR_1_USO_AX" OR "SR___MGNSAX" OR "SL_2_SSTAAX" OR "SL_2_DIMSAX" OR "AX___FPO_AX" OR "AX___FRO_AX" OR "AUX_POEORB" OR "AUX_GNSSRD" OR "SR_2_PCPPAX" OR "SR_2_PMPPAX" OR "SR___MGNPAX" OR "SR___POEPAX" OR "SR_2_SIFNAX" OR "SR_2_SIFSAX") AND product_type: $product_type

service_type : AUXIP AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_type : ("AUX_ICE" OR "AUX_TRO" OR "MPL_ORBPRE" OR "MPL_ORBRES" OR "MPL_TLEPRE" OR "TLM__REQ_B" OR "TLM__REQ_C" OR "TLM__REQ_D" OR "TLM__REQ_E" OR "TLM__REQ_F" OR "AUX_CAMSFO" OR "AUX_UT1UTC" OR "TLM__REQ_A" OR "TLM__REQ_B" OR "REP__CHF__" OR "REP__FCHF__" OR "MPL_ORBPRE" OR "MPL_ORBRES" OR "SR_2_PMPSAX" OR "SR_2_POL_AX" OR "SR_2_PGI_AX" OR "SR_2_RGI_AX" OR "SR_1_USO_AX" OR "SR___MGNSAX" OR "SL_2_SSTAAX" OR "SL_2_DIMSAX" OR "AX___FPO_AX" OR "AX___FRO_AX" OR "AUX_POEORB" OR "AUX_GNSSRD" OR "SR_2_PCPPAX" OR "SR_2_PMPPAX" OR "SR___MGNPAX" OR "SR___POEPAX" OR "SR_2_SIFNAX" OR "SR_2_SIFSAX") AND product_type: $product_type

transfer_timeliness: [600000000 TO *] AND service_type : AUXIP AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_type: ("AUX_WND" OR "AUX_PREORB" OR "AUX_RESORB" OR "AUX_POEORB" OR "AUX_ECMWFD" OR "AX___MF1_AX" OR "AX___MFA_AX" OR "AX___MA1_AX" OR "AX___MF2_AX" OR "AX___MA2_AX" OR "SR___MDO_AX" OR "SR_2_RMO_AX" OR "SR_2_PMO_AX") AND product_type: $product_type

panels.title: Out of timeliness products (several per day)

targets.query: transfer_timeliness: [1800000000 TO *] AND service_type : AUXIP AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_type : ("AUX_ICE" OR "AUX_TRO" OR "MPL_ORBPRE" OR "MPL_ORBRES" OR "MPL_TLEPRE" OR "TLM__REQ_B" OR "TLM__REQ_C" OR "TLM__REQ_D" OR "TLM__REQ_E" OR "TLM__REQ_F" OR "AUX_CAMSFO" OR "AUX_UT1UTC" OR "TLM__REQ_A" OR "TLM__REQ_B" OR "REP__CHF__" OR "REP__FCHF__" OR "MPL_ORBPRE" OR "MPL_ORBRES" OR "SR_2_PMPSAX" OR "SR_2_POL_AX" OR "SR_2_PGI_AX" OR "SR_2_RGI_AX" OR "SR_1_USO_AX" OR "SR___MGNSAX" OR "SL_2_SSTAAX" OR "SL_2_DIMSAX" OR "AX___FPO_AX" OR "AX___FRO_AX" OR "AUX_POEORB" OR "AUX_GNSSRD" OR "SR_2_PCPPAX" OR "SR_2_PMPPAX" OR "SR___MGNPAX" OR "SR___POEPAX" OR "SR_2_SIFNAX" OR "SR_2_SIFSAX") AND product_type: $product_type

panels.title: Out of timeliness products (one per day)

list.definition: {"find":"terms","field":"product_type", "query":"mission: $mission AND satellite_unit : $satellite_unit AND product_level:$product_level  AND timeliness: $timeliness AND  service_type: AUXIP"}
list.label: Product Type
list.name: product_type
list.query: {"find":"terms","field":"product_type", "query":"mission: $mission AND satellite_unit : $satellite_unit AND product_level:$product_level  AND timeliness: $timeliness AND  service_type: AUXIP"}
